name: Raspberry Breakout
description:
Working on a small cool project called Raspberry Breakout!!! the concept is based off traditional Breakout genera. With a twits

So i thought of a cool game play mechanic for Raspberry Breakout.

You have a battery meter and as it discharges the pi board ie the paddle will slow down causing the player to think about there next move.

There also will be some sort of a charging station so the player can gain full speed again.

while keeping this in mind the player has to bounce the raspberry off the board and hit the blocks to gain a high score.

Controls 

Start the game left mouse button 

Move paddle A key D key Left arrow Right Arrow

Quit Game ESC
